favourite.article: We wanted to sing this in the meeting this morning, but we need it in Spanish. Is there a translation?
On how glorious this hymn is. Dear saints let's sing it prayerfully in the Lord and to the Lord.
To listen, view and even learn the hymns given by God to people obedient to His calling is like being in His presence. What a beautiful addition to my daily quiet time with Jesus, our Lord.
Amen, in the church we all find the flow! The riches of Christ flowing to us in the local church, for the church today are just Christ in every way! Hallelujah!!
Hymns gives me inspiration. It is very good to listen to.
The title and beginning lyric of this hymn by Charles Price Jones should be "Deeper, Deeper In the Love of Jesus". It seems more verses have been added as well.
I am a Christian. I love the classical hymns. I am looking for the best classical hymns. This song is touching my heart.
